SEARCH
Module com.projekt.oop.yourvotematters
Package com.projekt.oop.yourvotematters.view

Class MainPageView

java.lang.Object
com.projekt.oop.yourvotematters.view.MainPageView
public class MainPageView extends Object
This class is responsible for displaying the main page of the application. It contains the main menu, create voting form, view voting list, voting information and voting form.
Author:
Marek ÄŒederle
